titleStmt.title: Precious promises the portion of overcomers. / By John Lougher, minister of the Gospel.
titleStmt.author: Lougher, John, d. 1686.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by A. Maxwell, and R. Roberts, for Edw. Giles, bookseller in Norwich,

notesStmt.note: Consists of 7 sermons, each with caption title; register and pagination are continuous.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
